title: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. See tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. for code to reproduce the issue. The current tests have limitations and may produce false positives due to the lack of filenamechecking in harness verification of messages. It seems that AJDT omits the filename if it does not make sense to AJDT.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be listed in the form 'app/Main' rather than 'app.Main.class'.
